titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Memorial Christian Church records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Disciples of Christ congregation in Ann Arbor, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Materials that were placed in the Church cornerstone in 1923: history of the Church with names of members and officers, April-August 1923 Church meeting minutes; documents related to the Church building, Christian Men's Service Club, United Christian Missionary Society; newspaper clippings and map of Ann Arbor; photographs of members and officers of the Church (all identified), and of the razing of the old building in 1923. Also 1941 membership roll of this Disciples of Christ congregation, that was not among material found in the cornerstone and was accessioned separately.
